title: JOVANA 36 Pair Disposable Foam Pedicure Slippers Multi Color Flip Flop Salon Nail Spa (Colors May Vary)
features: These colorful pedicure slippers are durable, disposable, and inexpensive.
Adult Size Slippers but you can cut them down for kids use.
description: Let your customers wear these fun and sturdy Pedi Slippers out of the spa to avoid polish damage. These colorful pedicure slippers are durable, disposable, and inexpensive. One size fits most. Sold in packs of 36 pairs. These comfortable foam slippers are a great green option for day spas looking to help the environment as well as minimizing the cost of constant replacement
